FOUND IN: Drying out (becoming dry by losing water content)
Toltecs (predecessors to the Aztecs who had a significant influence on them)
Cancan (a high-energy French dance involving high kicks)

The most recognizable form is the igloo (plural: igloos), especially associated with snowy areas where blocks of compacted snow are cut and stacked to create a dome-shaped structure that serves as temporary shelter during hunting trips or harsh weather conditions.
Piast (referring to a historical dynasty associated with Polish territories including Warsaw)
Vernacular (Vernaculars) - The language or dialect spoken by the ordinary people in a particular country or region, which can include patois forms.
Nibble (Refers to taking very small bites)
